news_header: Terence Beney reflects on Elon Musk's upbringing in apartheid South Africa and his evolution into a controversial figure.
news_original_title: Elon Musk oli aidosti hyvä tyyppi, sanoo hänen entinen koulukaverinsa Ylelle – nyt hän ei ole samaa mieltä
news_text: Terence Beney, a schoolmate of Elon Musk, recalls their shared experiences growing up in apartheid South Africa and discusses Musk's transformation into a polarizing figure in the U.S. He reflects on the impact of their privileged education and the societal changes during their youth.
